chapters.title: Prologue: Distinctions
chapters.info: Dain Bornhald, p. 33—Son of Geofram. He now commands his own troops; he also plans to avenge his father's death. He has a hatred of Perrin, since he thinks he had a hand in killing his father. After being chased from the Two Rivers, he has taken sides with Galad against the new Lord Captain Commander, Eamon Valda. He is fond of brandy. See also Bornhald, Geofram.
